attributes.action: Make all firms who show 0845 etc. numbers the full geographic one as well.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people pay to have make "free phone calls" after joining the internet or use 18866. I think all firms etc. displaying a 0845 etc. number should have to also display the geographic e.g. 01206 number as well

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
